title: Pressing mute, end call by accident while doing other things with my hands. How to fix?
content: Sometimes when I get a call I put my phone to my ear while working with my two hands.. for example gardening and cooking..  when doing this my cheek presses the mute, end call, and is kinna anoying.. is there anyway to have the phone locked so that I don't press  mute or hanging up the call? Note I tried minimizing the call and locking it.. if you press the phone call box twice its back to mute end call window.. please help.
